data.actual_result: It appears below the server settings menu and therefore is difficult to make usage of
data.expected_result: The region selection should appear, overlaying the menu for server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server - Server settings - Change server region - The menu appears underneath the popup menu to edit your server settings - The top of the screen darkens and it you close the server settings menu, the selection of regions is visible
